directions: Combine beans, jalapenos, and chicken broth in a slow cooker. Season with garlic powder, chili powder, cumin, cayenne, pepper, and hot pepper sauce.
Cook on High for 4 hours. Reduce heat to Low, and continue cooking for 2 hours, or until you are ready to eat.
ingredients: 1 pound dry black beans, soaked overnight
title: Spicy Slow Cooker Black Bean Soup
